long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- This extension is used to remove the specific class in 'div' to see the list without horizonal scroll bar.
- The specifi class name is fixed as 'listViewContent' now.
  (The class name change may be supported further version)
- With removing the specific tag, user can see the web page with better readibility.
- The some developer can use this extension for some website that use the 'listViewContent' class
